abilities.name: Quick Shot
abilities.description: Fast single-target attack.

abilities.name: Lock On
abilities.description: Applies Marked to an enemy for 2 turns. This unit cannot dodge attacks and is easier to hit.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.description: Applies Stun to a single enemy. This unit skips its next turn.

abilities.name: Clean Strike
abilities.description: Precise single-target damage.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Applies Vulnerable to an enemy. This unit takes increased damage from all sources.

abilities.name: Overclock
abilities.description: Grants Attack Up to self. This unit deals increased damage.

abilities.name: Disruptor Hit
abilities.description: Deals damage with a chance to annoy.

abilities.name: System Jam
abilities.description: Applies Silenced to an enemy. This unit cannot use special abilities and can only perform basic attacks.

abilities.name: EMP Pulse
abilities.description: Applies Stun to all enemies (short duration). These units skip their next turn.

abilities.name: Swift Jab
abilities.description: Light damage, quick animation.

abilities.name: Evasive Roll
abilities.description: Grants Evasion Up to self. This unit has a higher chance to dodge attacks.

abilities.name: Riposte
abilities.description: Grants Counter for 2 turns. This unit automatically attacks back when hit.

abilities.name: Phase Strike
abilities.description: Single-target damage.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Grants Evasion Up to self. This unit has a higher chance to dodge attacks.

abilities.name: Reality Burn
abilities.description: Applies Damage Over Time to an enemy. This unit takes damage at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Sidearm Shot
abilities.description: Low damage attack.

abilities.name: Healing Aura
abilities.description: Grants Regen to all allies. These units recover health at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Protective Boost
abilities.description: Grants Defence Up to all allies. These units take reduced damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Dad Slap
abilities.description: Surprisingly effective damage.

abilities.name: Tactical Advice
abilities.description: Grants Attack Up to all allies. These units deal increased damage.

abilities.name: Hold the Line
abilities.description: Grants Defence Up to all allies. These units take reduced damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Guiding Strike
abilities.description: Balanced damage.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: Grants Regen and Evasion Up to self. This unit recovers health and has higher dodge chance.

abilities.name: Enlighten
abilities.description: Applies Vulnerable to all enemies. These units take increased damage from all sources.

abilities.name: Straight Punch
abilities.description: Reliable single-target damage.

abilities.name: Crowd Control
abilities.description: Applies Stun to an enemy. This unit skips its next turn.

abilities.name: Pressure Play
abilities.description: Applies Marked to an enemy. This unit cannot dodge attacks and is easier to hit.

abilities.name: Heavy Swing
abilities.description: Deals solid damage to a single enemy.

abilities.name: Bru Force
abilities.description: Grants Attack Up to self for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Shake It Off
abilities.description: Grants Defence Up to self for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Tail Whip
abilities.description: Heavy damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Dino Roar
abilities.description: Applies Vulnerable to all enemies. These units take increased damage from all sources.

abilities.description: Grants Defence Up to self. This unit takes reduced damage from attacks.

abilities.description: High base damage attack.

abilities.description: Applies Marked to an enemy. This unit cannot dodge attacks and is easier to hit.

abilities.description: Grants Counter to self. This unit automatically attacks back when hit.

abilities.description: Applies light damage.
